org.python.core.io

Class SocketIOBase<T extends java.nio.channels.Channel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.python.core.io.IOBase
      • org.python.core.io.RawIOBase
        • org.python.core.io.SocketIOBase<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatagramSocketIO, ServerSocketIO, SocketIO

    public abstract class SocketIOBase<T extends java.nio.channels.Channel>
extends RawIOBase
    Base raw I/O implementation for sockets.
    Author:
    Philip Jenvey

        public void close()
        Description copied from class: IOBase
        Flushes and closes the IO object. This must be idempotent. It should also set a flag for the 'closed' property (see below) to test.
